metadata.value: Progenitors of Leila Alston Siegling (n e Carpenter), mother of John Arthur Siegling[End Page 1] Leila Alston Siegling John Arthur Siegling b. Mar 14, 1907 [note written on page:] Carpenter information from Carpenter Memorial-- A Geneological history of the Rheoboth Branch by Amos B Carpenter-- Published Amherst Mass., 1898 William Carpenter ? 1520 married William Carpenter married William Carpenter b 1576 married William Carpenter 1605-1658 married Abigail? 1606-1687 Samuel Carpenter Prob. 1644 to circa 1682 married Sarah Ridgeway [note in pencil: Readaway?] Solomon Carpenter 1677-1750 married Elizabeth Tefft d 1750 [above Elizabeth Tefft:] Samuel Tefft m Elizabeth? Daniel Carpenter 1712-? married [illegible: Ranewed?] Smith Jeremiah Carpenter 1734-circa 1798 married Abigail Sheldon Jeremiah Carpenter 1765-1825 married Hanna Knowles 1765-Feb 1,? Gardiner Carpenter 1788-1859 married Patience Larkin 1789-1862 William Sanders Carpenter 1814-1884 married Margaret Enslow 1826-1904 Edward Huger Carpenter Dec. 6, 1857-Oct. 10, 1934 married Virginia Spencer Baxley Feb. 17, 1860-Feb. 5, 1934 Leila Alston Carpenter Feb 11, 1880 married John Arthur Siegling 1875-1924 John Arthur Siegling b. Mar 14, 1907 [note written on page:] La Noue (Lanneau) information taken from papers of Jeff Bennett Lanneau member at S.C. Huguenot Society Pierre La Noue b 1647 a Nantes, France married Pierre La Noue b 1682 married Marie Gvanger ? 1702 Pierre La Noue b 1710 married Margaret Richards b 1732 Pierre Basil La Noue b 1744 married Mary Dodne Pierre La Noue married Gracie Windsor Fleetwood Lanneau married Charlotte Elford Margaret Elford Lanneau married Joseph [Enslow?] Margaret Enslow 1826-1904 married William Sanders Carpenter 1814-1884 Edward Huger Carpenter Dec. 6, 1857-Oct. 10, 1934 married Virginia Spencer Baxley Feb. 17, 1860-Feb. 5, 1934 Leila Alston Carpenter Feb 11, 1880 m John Arthur Siegling 1875-1924 John Arthur Siegling b Mar 14, 1907 [note written on page:] Alston information from Alstons and Allstons of North and South Carolina-- by Joseph Groves [illegible: hole in page]. Atlanta, Ga.; Franklin Printing Co., 1901 [note written on page:] John A. Siegling fecit June 8th, 1939 William Alston will dated 1564 married Anna Simonds or Symons Edward Alston will dated 1591 married Elizabeth Colman William Alston 1537-1617 married Elizabeth-- co-heir of Hampstead Grandaughter of Wm. [Bindloss?] Thomas Alston 1564-1619 married Francis Bloomfield John Alston 1610-1687 married Dorothy Temple d 1668 [above Dorothy Temple:] Sir John Temple married?
